Interface S4AnnotationClient

    public interface S4AnnotationClient
extends S4AbstractClient

    • Method Detail

      • annotateDocument

        AnnotatedDocument annotateDocument(String documentText,
                                   SupportedMimeType documentMimeType)
                            throws S4ServiceClientException
        Annotates a single document with the specified MIME type. Returns an object which allows for convenient access to the annotations in the annotated document.
        Parameters:
        documentText - the document content to annotate
        documentMimeType - the MIME type of the document which will be annotated
        Returns:
        An AnnotatedDocument containing the original content as well as the annotations produced
        Throws:
        S4ServiceClientException - Error

      • annotateDocument

        AnnotatedDocument annotateDocument(URL documentUrl,
                                   SupportedMimeType documentMimeType,
                                   boolean imageTagging,
                                   boolean imageCategorization)
                            throws S4ServiceClientException
        Annotates a document publicly available under a given URL and tags and categorizes any images inside.
        Parameters:
        documentUrl - the publicly accessible URL from where the document will be downloaded
        documentMimeType - the MIME type of the document which will be annotated
        imageTagging - The boolean flag to allow/deny image tagging of the document
        imageCategorization - The boolean flag to allow/deny image categorization of the document
        Returns:
        An AnnotatedDocument object with the processed image tags and categories
        Throws:
        S4ServiceClientException - Error

      • annotateDocument

        AnnotatedDocument annotateDocument(File documentFile,
                                   Charset documentEncoding,
                                   SupportedMimeType documentMimeType)
                            throws IOException,
                                   S4ServiceClientException
        Annotates the contents of a single file with the specified MIME type. Returns an object which allows for convenient access to the annotations in the annotated document.
        Parameters:
        documentFile - the file containing the data to be annotated
        documentEncoding - the encoding of the document file
        documentMimeType - the MIME type of the document to annotated content as well as the annotations produced
        Returns:
        An AnnotatedDocument which allows for convenient access to the annotations in the annotated document.
        Throws:
        IOException - Error
        S4ServiceClientException - Error

      • annotateDocument

        AnnotatedDocument annotateDocument(URL documentUrl,
                                   SupportedMimeType documentMimeType)
                            throws S4ServiceClientException
        Annotates a single document publicly available under a given URL. Returns an object which allows for convenient access to the annotations in the annotated document
        Parameters:
        documentUrl - the publicly accessible URL from where the document will be downloaded
        documentMimeType - the MIME type of the document which will be annotated
        Returns:
        An AnnotatedDocument which allows for convenient programmatic access to the annotated document
        Throws:
        S4ServiceClientException - Error

      • annotateDocumentAsStream

        InputStream annotateDocumentAsStream(String documentText,
                                     SupportedMimeType documentMimeType,
                                     ResponseFormat serializationFormat)
                              throws S4ServiceClientException
        Annotates a single document and returns an InputStream from which the contents of the serialized annotated document can be read
        Parameters:
        documentText - the contents of the document which will be annotated
        documentMimeType - the MIME type of the file which will be annotated
        serializationFormat - the format which will be used for serialization of the annotated document
        Returns:
        An InputStream from which the serialization of the annotated document can be read
        Throws:
        S4ServiceClientException - Error

      • annotateDocumentAsStream

        InputStream annotateDocumentAsStream(File documentFile,
                                     Charset documentEncoding,
                                     SupportedMimeType documentMimeType,
                                     ResponseFormat serializationFormat)
                              throws IOException,
                                     S4ServiceClientException
        Annotates the contents of a single file returning an InputStream from which the annotated content can be read
        Parameters:
        documentFile - the file which will be annotated
        documentEncoding - the encoding of the file which will be annotated
        documentMimeType - the MIME type of the file which will be annotated
        serializationFormat - the serialization format used for the annotated content
        Returns:
        An InputStream from which the serialization of the annotated document can be read
        Throws:
        IOException - if there are problems reading the contents of the file
        S4ServiceClientException - Error

      • annotateDocumentAsStream

        InputStream annotateDocumentAsStream(URL documentUrl,
                                     SupportedMimeType documentMimeType,
                                     ResponseFormat serializationFormat)
                              throws S4ServiceClientException
        Annotates a single document publicly available under a given URL. Returns An InputStream from which the annotated content can be read
        Parameters:
        documentUrl - the publicly accessible URL from where the document will be downloaded
        documentMimeType - the MIME type of the document which will be annotated
        serializationFormat - the serialization format of the output
        Returns:
        An InputStream from where the serialized output can be read
        Throws:
        S4ServiceClientException - Error

      • annotateDocumentAsStream

        InputStream annotateDocumentAsStream(URL documentUrl,
                                     SupportedMimeType documentMimeType,
                                     ResponseFormat serializationFormat,
                                     boolean imageTagging,
                                     boolean imageCategorization)
                              throws S4ServiceClientException
        Annotates a single document publicly available under a given URL and categorizes and tags (if specified) any images inside. Returns an InputStream from which the annotated content can be read
        Parameters:
        documentUrl - the publicly accessible URL from where the document will be downloaded
        documentMimeType - the MIME type of the document which will be annotated
        serializationFormat - the serialization format of the output
        imageTagging - The boolean flag to allow/deny image tagging of the document
        imageCategorization - The boolean flag to allow/deny image categorization of the document
        Returns:
        An InputStream from where the serialized output can be read
        Throws:
        S4ServiceClientException - Error
